Key Match Events: The Chicago Cubs lost to the New York Yankees 3-0 on September 6, 2024, at Wrigley Field.
The Cubs recorded only one hit, a Cody Bellinger double in the fourth inning, in the shutout.
Yankees starter Luis Gil allowed one hit in six innings in the Yankees' 3-0 win.
Yankees center fielder Aaron Judge hit an RBI double in the third inning and scored in the same inning.
Yankees right fielder Juan Soto singled in the third inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yankees first baseman Anthony Rizzo was welcomed back to Wrigley Field before the game and saluted the crowd before batting in the second inning.
A fair amount of Yankees fans were seen in the stands during the game.
Sarah Zematis and her daughter Sophia attended the game courtesy of the Anthony Rizzo Family Foundation.
